blogPost.excerpt: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.
blogPost.body: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.
blogPost.title: Bits of Stock - The Stock Rewards App
blogPost.author: Arash Asady

localize.description: 加入股票奖励革命! 在您购物时自动获得您喜爱的品牌的零碎股份。无需 "点击激活"。只需连接任意数量的银行账户，便可坐享股票奖励。
加入股票獎勵革命! 在您購物時自動獲得您喜愛的品牌的零碎股份。無需 "點擊激活"。只需連接任意數量的銀行賬戶，便可坐享股票獎勵。

previous.excerpt: A minimalist Flutter framework inspired from TailwindCSS and SwiftUI for rapidly building custom designs.
previous.title: VelocityX - A minimalist Flutter framework

localize.description: 一个简约的Flutter框架，灵感来自于TailwindCSS和SwiftUI，用于快速构建自定义设计。
一個簡約的Flutter框架，靈感來自於TailwindCSS和SwiftUI，用於快速構建自定義設計。

next.excerpt: BlockSurvey is an online form and survey platform with a focus on privacy and security. Think of it as an alternative to SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Forms but with a focus on privacy and security. It is powered by Stacks Blockchain.
next.title: BlockSurvey 2.0 - Secure forms & surveys, powered by Stacks blockchain

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一个注重隐私和安全的在线表格和调查平台。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隐私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks区块链提供支持的安全表格和调查问卷。

localize.description: BlockSurvey是一個注重隱私和安全的在線表格和調查平臺。把它看作是SurveyMonkey、Typeform、Google Forms的替代品，但注重隱私和安全。它由Stacks Blockchain提供支持。
localize.tagline: 由Stacks區塊鏈提供支持的安全表格和調查問卷。
